import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 100)
plt.plot(x, np.sin(x), label='sin(x)')
plt.plot(x, np.cos(x), label='cos(x)')
plt.legend()
plt.title('Trigonometric Functions')
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.show()
